results.title: Sports training film series
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth Isaacs and Guardian Royal Exchange Assurance
results.brief_description: A series of instructional prprgrams in which the performance of international athletes is used to demonstrate and analyse the basic techniques of a particular track or field event. Narrated by Ron Pickering.

results.title: Athletics: the triple jump
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Performances by international athletes Frank Attoh, Nat Augustin, Barbara Clarke, Reynold Edwards, Kim Hagger, Colin Mitchell and Daley Thompson are used to demonstrate and analyse the basic techniques of the triple jump. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
results.description:

results.title: Athletics: hurdles
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Looks at high hurdling and 400 metre hurdles and shows, at normal speed and in slow motion, the basic actions of hurdling as demonstrated in relay matches between Oxford and Cambridge. Narrated by Ron Pickering.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.

results.title: Athletics: the long jump
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Daley Thompson, Britain’s greatest ever all round athlete, shows a variety of jumping, hopping and bounding activities that condition the jumper.

results.title: Fitness for sport
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
This film shows how to attain the basic physical fitness which all sportsmen need for success - whatever their sport. More than fifty exercises are demonstrated and a squad of athletes is taken through a training session devised by a former Polish Olympic athlete to develop mobility, elastic strength and endurance. Written and narrated by Ron Pickering.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.

Written and narrated by Ron Pickering.

results.title: The Shot
results.creator_credit: Peter Delfgou, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
This film on shot put shows how muscular force should be applied through the body to the shot. It demonstrates training and warm up procedures which should be used prior to the competition throw. From the series “Athletic training”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Delfgou, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions

results.title: Strength training for sport
results.creator_credit: Paul Foxall, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”
The explosion of new athletic records has largely come about through strength training. The training program must strengthen all muscle groups. The various strength training techniques and exercises are demonstrated by top athletes.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Paul Foxall, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions

results.title: Single sculling techniques
results.creator_credit: Michael Johns, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Sports training film series”.
Slow motion and freeze-frame photography is used to demonstrate common faults in sculling techniques, and showing the correct techniques. Excellent film with very good commentary.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Michael Johns, Elizabeth Isaacs and Dan Productions
